chapters.title: Chapter 49: Court of the Sun
chapters.info: Oncala, p. 727—Person through whose eyes Aviendha sees her fifth step through the columns of Rhuidean on her second trip. She is likely to marry Hehyal. It was she who devised the plot to drag Andor into the war against the Seanchan, which eventually brought ruin to both Andor and the Aiel. She is Aviendha's granddaughter. See also Aviendha; Hehyal; Talana.
